revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DAP-1530 |revision=A1 |fcc_date=10/02/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=MTN / Shenzhen MTN Electronics |type=range extender |fcc_id=KA2AP1530A1 |ic_id=4216A-AP1530A1 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.3 |pwr_conn=AC (direct) |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7628A;MT7628AN; |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7628A;MT7628AN; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.0.50 }}
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC750 Plus WiFi Range Extender}} Despite being branded as "AC750 Plus" this device appears to actually be 2-stream for both bgn and an+ac radios. The hardware supports 2-stream and the user manual on the FCC says, "Thanks to the latest Wireless AC technology, the DAP-1530 provides a wireless connection at up to 1200 Mbps with other 802.11ac wireless devices." The exact same hardware is used in the [[D-Link DAP-1610 rev A1]] which is advertised as AC1200. This is likely just an attempt at market segmentation. * Web GUI: http://dlinkap.local./
